none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 14, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
The second demo from these NYC punks is even more vicious than the first. Tough as nails and desperately fierce, the five tracks on this tape are a perfect example of what happens when you do it right and you do it with intensity..."Room 11" is so simple if you break down the parts, but holy shit is that track powerful. And the intro for the closer "Kalma Konsensya" seems like the band is trying to reign it in for effect but they are still dying to break loose - this is an energy that carries into the slower chorus riff of the song as well, and it's an energy that you can't fake. You have it or you don't....and NAMATAY SA INGAY have it.  THIRD WORLD BASTARDS OF NEW YORK Physical copies from Aklasan Records...
http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2015/06/namatay-sa-ingay.html https://namataysaingay.bandcamp.com/ http://aklasanrecords.bigcartel.com/

seo.title: Namatay Sa Ingay - T.W.B.N.Y. - Terminal Escape
